title: Where Is Bard Mountain?? Where is Bard??
body:
Is riot foreshadowing an epic Bard event of Bard proportions for all the Bard mains to revel and rejoice in the glory of Bard and a possible ultimate Bard skin??  

... Or did they forget? -__-  Where is Bard??

Bard mountain is in Ionia as far as I know.

I'm fairly certain they said Bard Mountain happened in Ionia, with the Noxian invaders trying to steal an artifact of immense power. This actually matches the recent lore that came with Swain really well, where Darkwill was basically being a little bitch boy and getting LeBlanc all the artifacts of power she wanted at the cost of countless Noxian lives. Bard is definitely a godly celestial space entity like Aurelion so it makes sense he doesn't fit into the map as he isn't enslaved by Targon, but the mountain should be somewhere.

I agree with you, but I also am upset that Aurelion is on Mt.Targon despite not being an ally.... Of course, Bard is mysterious, so I understand Riot not wanting to give too much away.... But, at least, the mountain should be around Ionia's outskirts somewhere.

I hope Bard appears in a cameo in some other stories sometime in the near future. There is a leaked Syndra story going around the internet and while I won't give the entire story away, I will say that a fairly major character left out of the new canon makes her perfect first appearance, it's basically the equivalent of a post-credit scene and it's awesome. Something like that with Bard would be great.
omg what is this story who is it please tell me thanks
